thread.section_title: Planet of the Vapes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Planet of the Vapes | planetofthevapes.com | 5 of 77
thread.title: Frank
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Frank

author: Frank
title: Frank
text:
I ordered a vaporizer on a Friday afternoon and the package arrived on my doorstop Monday afternoon. So pleased at the fast service! And the product was in great condition and met all my expectations.
If there is one room for improvement, it's that when I wrote a review of the product on Planet of the Vape's website, I could not get the review to be categorized as a "Verified Buyer" even though I obviously bought the product a few days ago. It would only allow me to be categorized as a "Verified Reviewer". Wish there was a way to have that changed. Still, that's one small complaint for an overall great shopping experience.
